product_name: Whispbar WB701 Aero Mid-Size Cargo Roof Box
long_description: Sized to complement SUVs and mid-sized sedans, the Whispbar WB701 Aero Mid-Size Cargo Roof Box features premium materials and a sleek, high-gloss finish. Universal mounting clamps adjust for use with any roof rack bars. Spring-loaded hinges make one-handed opening and closing a breeze. Dual-sided opening makes it easy to load up the roof box from either side of your vehicle. Dual-layer lid adds stiffness and reduces drag. Integrated Lock System (ILS) features an indicator that lets you know for sure when the roof box is latched shut. Can accommodate skis up to 190cm long.
short_description: Sized to complement SUVs and mid-sized sedans, the Whispbar WB701 Aero Mid-Size Cargo Roof Box features premium materials and a sleek, high-gloss finish.
